Html:
I have the need to use Irony with and with out the comments parsed 

What would be the best way to include / exclude comments?

 

Andrew

If you want to parse comments that supposedly have some internal structure (like xml comments in c#), your best way would be to handle ValidateToken event on the comment terminal and do all custom processing there. This event is invoked when scanner finishes producing token.
